stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
Want to give your Shopify website a custom design?

Shopify is one of the fastest growing Ecommerce platforms out there and now you can get your custom store design implemented into a website template.

Now you can marry the powerful Shopify features with your own specifically designed store.

I will take your design and implement it across your store on the main pages including:

- Homepage
- Category Page
- Product Page
- Content Page (About Us Shipping Returns)
- Shopping Cart
- Checkout (css only)
- Custom theme settings

Let me help you convert your custom website design into a powerful Shopify site template today.

What can I expect?

  • Chop Design to HTML
  • Create custom site template
  • Testing
  • Revision round one
  • Revision round two
title: Convert PSD to Shopify Template
